channel.title: HackTheBox on wayneJLee
channel.description: Recent content in HackTheBox on wayneJLee

item.title: Zero to OSCP
item.description: Hello World! This post was written for those who are starting out and feeling overwhelmed by the breadth and depth of Infosec. To make it as relatable as possible, I decided to make this a series of posts in which I go through the phases & challenges I faced through: OSCP OSWE Red Team Ops by Zero-Point Security It’s unlikely that a majority of you readers come from the same background as I have, therefore this post won’t be a preparation guide per se.
